definition: To value or appreciate something or someone, often used to express estimation or estimation of worth. It can also refer to estimating or guessing a quantity or value.

examples.german: Kannst du den Wert dieses Gemäldes schätzen?
examples.english: Can you estimate the value of this painting?
He values her opinion a lot.

examples.german: Ich schätze, dass es noch eine Stunde dauern wird.
examples.english: I estimate that it will take another hour.
